Class KillerAppBase

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
org.jscience.apps.framework.KillerAppBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppProvider, ViewerProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
CivilizationApp, CrisprDesignApp, CrystalStructureApp, MarketCrashApp, PandemicForecasterApp, QuantumCircuitApp, SmartGridApp, TitrationApp
public abstract class KillerAppBase extends javafx.application.Application implements AppProvider
Abstract base class for all JScience Killer Apps. Provides standard application framework with menus, toolbars, status bar, preferences, and internationalization support.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
